123.content:
Kayla is relieved that the doctor said there's nothing seriously wrong with her, and the recent bedwetting incidents are likely to pass at some point. But before that happens, her mother insists that Kayla is going to wear protection at night.

''Can't I just stay in the car, please mom...'' Kayla begs but Fran denies her request. ''Nope, I need you to come with me to choose the best possible option regarding the protection you'll gonna wear.'' she says.

They go to a store and straight to the diaper aisle. Kayla keeps looking around nervously, fearing that a friend or someone she knows is gonna walk into them. Fran begins to look at the different selection, first noticing the Goodnites bedwetting pants, the ones Kayla used to wear 7 years ago when she last wet the bed. Obviously she'll need to get a bigger size this time, though. ''These bigger ones should fit you well...'' she says. She also notices a new product, or at least one she hasn't seen before. They're diapers, especially designed for night-time use for bigger kids or even teens who still have problems staying dry during the night, and require some extra absorbency. ''These seem to be quite thick and able to hold a lot...'' she says as she examines them.

Kayla, with her face getting more red by the minute tells her mom to hurry up. After thinking for a while Fran decides to buy....

12322221.content:
Kayla feels defeated. There's no way she could argue with her mom, and the more she thought about it... the more she hoped Fran had a point. She only had to wear them at night, right, so perhaps it wouldn't be so bad?

Her mother lays out all of her clothes for the weekend. A few skirts, a pair of shortalls, a generous supply of PJs and baggy T-shirts... everything she would need, hopefully. "Kayla, this will be fine. Now, we're leaving for Jennifer's in just a bit, so let's get these packed." Kayla nods, a bit moody still, but doing her best to help. Once everything is in her little duffel, her mother looks up against the wall. "Sweetie, you have everything you want to take in your backpack, don't you? Bring it here." As Kayla gets her bag, her mother opens the pack of diapers. Unbeknownst to her daughter, she's about to fill it the rest of the way with spare diapers.

"Here we go," she says in a chipper tone. The bag opens with a zip, and several of the soft, crinkling undergarments are packed in atop the books, knick-knacks, and entertainment Kayla had planned to bring.

"Mom, wait! I don't need that many..." Unfortunately, her mother isn't budging, and just zips the bag up in spite of the protests.

"Sweetie, we don't have time for this. It's almost time to leave, and I don't want you to be late! Now, let's..."

Kayla sighs and follows her mom downstairs and they get to the car. During the ride Kayla looks absolutely miserable and Fran does her best to comfort her. ''Don't worry sweetie, everything will be just fine.'' she says reassuringly.

After a short drive they arrive at Jennifer's place and Kayla gets out of the car and goes to ring the doorbell. She's happily greeted by Jennifer who gives her friend a warm hug. ''My parents just left with my sister so we have the house for ourselves for the entire weekend!'' she says in an excited voice.

They get in and Kayla starts settling in, taking her backpack to Jennifer's room. She then tells Jennifer that she has to use the bathroom. She enters the bathroom and locks the door. After finishing she realizes there's no toilet paper, so she opens up one of the cabinets to look for some. She finds it, but also makes an interesting discovery. ''Wait what, are these...'' she mutters to herself as she picks up and opened package of Goodnites, similar to the ones her mom had brought for her earlier along with the diapers.

If Jennifer also wets the bed her situation wouldn't be nearly as embarrassing, Kayla thinks.

Kayla was happy when the doctor said there didn't seem to be any issues causing her to wet the bed. Fran meanwhile took it entirely different believing that must mean her daughter had to purposely be wetting the bed. The mother knew she had to get to the bottom of this right now she wasn't going to be changing sheets every night. As the two approached the car and got in she came up with an idea to get some answers.

While the 14 year old Kayla was happy that they must be headed home she was surprised to see her mom pull their car into another parking lot down the street.
"Mom why are we here?" Asked the blonde teen in confusion. "Where are we?"
Fran looked at her daughter. "We are going to see a different type of doctor to see if we can get some answers.....so get out and lets head!"

Kayla got out of the car not wanting to argue and just get it over with so she got out when her mother did and entered the building trying to figure out where they were. She saw the building say it was Hypnotherapy with Dr. Sheila Gothenburg.

Kayla rolled her eyes as they headed in believing hypnotherapy to be a joke. She got seated as her mother checked her. They were called back surprisingly quick and went into the back as the doctor came n. As the teen didn't bother listening to her mother and this doctor talk due to how boring it was she let her mind wander. Eventually she snapped back when she heard her mom say something.

"...that is why I we are here I want to try and get some answers from her to why she is wetting again." Fran said noticing the doctor nodding her head in agreement that she understand would. The doctor and Fran then turned their attention to Kayla.

Kayla blushed as both her mom and the doctor looked at her. Before she knew it the doctor had come up to her and was already starting the "therapy".

She saw a changing table with supplies, multiple packs of pampers in the largest packages there must have easily been hundreds of diapers, a toybox, a dollhouse, a large amount of stuffed animals, and even the clothes in her closet seemed to be different. The crib she was now in was where her bed used to be. Yet the layout made it clear it was her own bedroom..

The teenager was in disbelief as she sucked on the pacifier not really remembering the pacifier in her mouth. How was she going to get out of this one? Where did all her stuff go? Why was everything replaced?

Her room door swung open rather quickly. In the doorway stood her smirking mother.

"Good you are awake!" Her mother said as she walked over towards the crib. "I see you noticed your new room do you like it?"

Kayla spit out her pacifier and answered....

153.content:
Lana was very excited. She was about to go to her first real sleepover ever. Last week, when her best friend Lucy invited her she instanlty said yes. Lucys parents where also fine with it. After her mom had allowed it too she was so happy, even thrilled.
She was only a bit wondering that her mom was hesitating and seemed to be a little nervous.
Lana could not understand why. She was no baby anymore that gets homesick. She had proven that a couple of times when she stayed over at her aunt or at her grandparents, sometimes even for 2 nights in a row without seeing her mom, so she should handle that..and at a friend it just has to be even better!

Finaly it was saturday, early afternoon, right after lunch her mom would bring her to Lucys house. With help from her mom she had packed her bag, including her teddybear, toiletries, clothes for the next day, her pyjamas and of course her goodnites, even a spare one, just in case.
Lana had no problem with them, she packed them right on the top.

She noticed that her mom still seemed to be a bit worried about the whole sleepover thing, but Lana didnt asked why.

What she did not know was that her mom was indeed nervous, not because her daughter might get homesick, but about the bedwetting and the goodnites.For her it was never a problem that Lana was still a bedwetter, she had that issue herself when she was Lanas age and she did her best to make her not feel bad about. When Lanas mom was a child she felt bad and her own family always blamed her. She surely didnt want to make the same mistakes.

But now she was struggling.Should she keep up the lie that bedwetting is so comon that a majority of kids her age does and that most of her classmates might still wear diapers or pullups like Lana to bed, or was it time to prepare her daughter that Lucx might find it a bit odd or ,in the worst case, might even tease Lana?

Lana looked at her mom confused. "Mom I'm not a baby anymore I'm a big girl, I'm 8 I can handle being at a sleepover with out you for one night. I promise." She says almost mocking her mother with the last sentence. Her mom smiles as she helps Lana out of the van and with her bag.

1544.content:
Benjamin still sulked because his parents had forced him to sleep in the little kids room. His stupid siblings had been especially stupid to him all day, too. So he was lying awake, scheming and mulling over plans on how to get back at them.

It must have been a few hours of him drifting off into an uneasy slumber and waking up again, when in his half-asleep mind he heard Dean shift on his mattress. The stupid kid tossed and turned and generally made enough of a ruckus to wake Benjamin fully. Benjamin was about to angrily tell the boy to settle down, when Dean sat up. Benjamin decided to stay silent and pretend to be asleep. Dean got up and slowly moved in the direction of the door, but about half-way there he stopped. Then he quickly ran back to his own mattress and dove under the blanket. After a moment, he crawled back out. Wearing his blanket as a kind of cloak, he tiptoed over to Benjamin’s own bed.

“Benji?” the boy whispered. “Benji! Are you awake?” He shook on Benjamin’s arm. Benjamin, still pretending to be fast asleep, peered at him through one squinted eye. The way Dean was pressing his legs together and was dancing in place, it was quite obvious that he had to take a wee.

Part of Benjamin wanted to hate the kid for waking up because he had to pee while Benjamin still wet the bed at more than twice his age. On the other hand, Dean hadn’t really given him much reason to hate him, in fact they hadn’t much interacted at all. If anything, Dean seemed like a nice kid – and Ben had seen his evil sister bully him for wetting the bed, too.

“Benji! Wake up!” Dean whined, his voice growing more urgent. “Benji? Benji!” he shook Benjamin’s shoulder again. Benjamin…

choices: "I need help with my night diaper."
15443.content:
"What do you want?" Benjamin asked, acting as if he had finally waken up.

"I need to go to the bathroom." Dean replied.

"Why can't you go by yourself?"
15443.title: …asked him what he wanted.

choices: Maybe he should use the bathroom himself. “I’ll take you there!” he said.
“Want me to bring you to the potty?” he asked.
“There is no monster! Just go!” he said and turned around.
“Just go in your diaper if it’s that urgent,” he told him.
154431.content:
“It’s dark,” Dean pointed out. “What if there’s a monster in the bathroom?”
“If there is, it’s just Felix trying to scare you.” Benjamin’s reply didn’t seem to reassure his young cousin. Nervously, Dean danced in place and looked at Ben pitiable. Ben sighed.
154431.title: "The dark is scary..."

choices: The door was locked, it was occupied. They head to a different bathroom.
The door's unlocked, but someone is in there.
The door's unlocked, and nobody's in there.
1544311.content:
Benjamin realized that maybe he could go after Dean finished. "How about I take you there?" Dean seemed to find that agreeable.

Benjamin got out of bed, took Dean by the hand, and walked to the bathroom with him.
1544311.title: Maybe he should use the bathroom himself. “I'...

choices: …take Dean to his parents’ master bathroom.
…suggests Dean pee in the potty of one of their younger cousins.
…find somewhere else to pee for the two of them.
15443111.content:
Dean followed Benjamin, securing his groin with his free hand and waddling slightly due to his bulky diaper. Ben grinned to himself. Dean actually looked kinda cute and for a second he wondered how it would be to have a little brother himself. He sure wouldn’t be mean to him like Felix was to him.
They reached the bathroom door without running into any monsters, but when Benjamin pulled down the handle, he found it locked. “Huh?” he muttered.
“Occupied!” his sister Bernadette called from inside.
“Hurry up, Dean needs the loo!”
“Go away pottypants! I’ll be a while!”
Ben exchanged a pained look with Dean, who was pressing his legs together and fidgeting. “Can you wait a little longer?”
Dean nodded, though Ben wasn't sure how true that was. He decided to…
15443111.title: The door was locked, it was occupied. They head...

choices: Ben and Dean had both peed themselves. (Either a little or all the way.)
Only Dean had peed himself. (A little or all the way.)
Only Ben had peed himself. (A little or all the way.)
15443112.content:
Holding Benjamin’s hand with his right and securely pressing his left to his groin, Dean waddled after Ben. They safely made it to the bathroom without encountering any monsters. Benjamin pulled open the door and switched on the light, then he ushered Dean inside. “See, no monster,” he just said when suddenly Felix jumped out from behind the shower curtain and cried: “Boo!”

When he saw that he had given both Dean and Ben a good scare, an evil grin sneaked on Felix’ face.
15443112.title: The door's unlocked, but someone is in there.

choices: It was tape-on, so he needed help with that.
It slid on and off like pants, so he could do it himself.
His 'protection' was a mat or pad on his mattress, so he didn't wear anything.
154431124.content:
Dean had been potty trained for over two years, and Benjamin, over 7. So their daytime bladder control was very good.

When the shock died down, Benjamin looked at Felix. "Real mature. I was helping Dean go to the bathroom. You know, being responsible and kind. Unlike you."

Dean walked up to the toilet and started getting on, as Felix left, giggling a little.

Did Dean need help with his night protection?
154431124.title: Neither had peed themselves.

choices: Dean quickly shook his head, though he sure looked like he needed help.
“If I take it off, I can’t put it back on,” Dean explained his problem.
1544311241.content:
Benjamin stared after Felix darkly, then he turned back to Dean. He was about to step outside himself to give Dean some privacy when he saw him struggle with his attire. Ben thought he recognised the tapes of a diaper that showed under Dean’s pulled-down pants.

“You need help with that?” he asked.
1544311241.title: It was tape-on, so he needed help with that.

choices: Dean shook his head. He was still scared of the dark.
He nodded. He wasn't scared anymore.
15443112411.content:
Benjamin moved closer, squatted down, and helped undo the tapes of the diaper, leaving Dean naked. Dean hopped on the toilet, while Benjamin turned around.

prssssshhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh

WHOOOOOSH

"I'm done."

Dean got off the toilet, and with a bit of help from Benjamin, got his night diaper back on. "Can you head back to the room by yourself?" asked Benjamin.
15443112411.title: “Yeah,” Dean shyly nodded his head.

choices: …embarrassed explained that he couldn’t pee when someone was looking.
154431124111.content:
Dean hurriedly shook his head. After their encounter with Felix he looked even more scared of the dark.
“Ok, can you wait a moment? I gotta take a wee, too,” Benjamin said.
Dean nodded shyly.
Ben pulled down his pyjama pants, then he realised that Dean was still standing there and staring at him. Dean mistook his hesitation and happily pointed at Ben’s own diaper. “Need help?”
Benjamin…
154431124111.title: Dean shook his head. He was still scared of the...

155.content:
Kyle, 5: A late potty trainer, Kyle still wets the bed, which is normal at his age... but he still feels like a baby at bedtime...

Maya, 6: Maya's usually dry at naptime, but a bit too much juice means a leak at her school, and a lot of teasing.

Eric, 8: His parents refuse to buy sheet protection or Goodnites, meaning every night is a sheet change. He feels so bad about it...

Lucille, 13: After a genetics project in school, Lucille finds out that bedwetting is commonly inherited. Thus, she begins some research to figure out if it comes from mom's side of the family, dad's, or both.
155.title: even more characters

info.brief_description: Here you'll follow a bedwetter and the stress and crazy situations they get into.
info.description:
You'll follow a bedwetter and the conflicts they get into including the stress.
They'll be embarrassed by family members odd situations, and even some funny moments.
Please add chapters more than one sentences and include details.
Thank you and happy writing!
info.pretty_title: Life and stress of a bedwetter
